item.description:
St. Sarahâ€™s is a parish of the Apostolic Johannite Church, an esoteric, Gnostic Christian communion following in the Tradition of St. John the Beloved and St. John the Baptist. We celebrate our spirituality within One, Holy, Catholic and Apostolic Church, using the Seven Sacraments in our worship, which are administered by bishops and priests ordained under valid Apostolic Succession. We welcome members from a wide variety of faith traditions, keeping the door open and the lights on for you to find your path through learning, ritual, prayer, meditation, and the unity of catholic and esoteric ceremony. We recognize the Sacred Flame to be present in all Beings and therefore our Sacraments are open to everyone without discrimination on the basis of gender, race, social status or sexual orientation.
Official site: http://stsarah.wordpress.com/ Email: stsarahs@johannite.org Phone: (617) 418-3289 Mailing Address: P.O. Box 1775 Lowell, MA 01853
item.name: St. Sarah's Parish :: Gnostic Church and Discussion Group
